name: Bridge Ridge
description:
Contributors: Lauren, Rafael, & Sarah

Right now, to play:
select your villager to move the. move them to a location with a right mouse click. They can only make small elevation changes, not big. 
use 'b' to toggle bridge mode, where you can add and delete bridges. bridges can only connect equal elevations.

Goal: right now, try to reach the mountain behind your village! (let us know if you beat hard ;) )
